Name: personalized_discount_strategy
Title: Personalized Discount Strategy: Optimizing Revenue with Individualized Coupons
Experiment: Develop a personalized discount strategy by analyzing customer spending habits, preferred dining times, and group sizes. Assign different coupon amounts and discount rates to each customer based on their historical data, and simulate expected revenue. Compare results against a uniform discount approach to evaluate the improvement in ROI and total revenue.

Name: group_discount_targeting
Title: Group Discount Targeting: Maximizing Revenue by Focusing on Large Groups
Experiment: Focus on offering higher-value coupons to customers with a history of dining in groups (3 or more people). Analyze past revenue data for group dining and simulate how targeted group discounts impact revenue and ROI. Adjust the minimum spending threshold to optimize the balance between revenue growth and coupon usage costs.

Name: loyalty_tiered_rewards
Title: Loyalty Tiered Rewards: Enhancing Customer Engagement Through Tailored Coupons
Experiment: Modify the coupon generation function to assess customer loyalty based on frequency and recency of visits. Segment users into two categories: loyal customers and new/infrequent customers. Assign different coupon values accordingly. Implement a feedback mechanism to monitor coupon redemption rates and customer satisfaction. Simulate expected revenue and engagement from this strategy and compare against a uniform coupon distribution. Analyze results for ROI and customer retention metrics.

Name: dynamic_coupon_adjustment
Title: Dynamic Coupon Adjustment: Tailoring Discounts Based on Recent Customer Visits
Experiment: Modify the existing coupon generation function to include a real-time analysis of each user's recent visit frequency to restaurants. Adjust coupon amounts based on whether users have visited within the last week or month, creating higher-value coupons for more frequent visitors. Simulate the impact of this strategy against a static coupon allocation, focusing on engagement metrics and ROI.
